overview: Mixing clever practical jokes, hidden cameras and a few unsuspecting victims, this hilarious compilation of hidden-camera pranks chronicles the madcap fun that ensues when people are unwittingly put in strange situations. In these two volumes, innocent victims participate in a bizarre blindfolded smell test, become involved in a mistaken identity situation, are exposed to margarine ice cream, experience a concealed crocodile and much more.
title: Just for Laughs: Gags: Vols. 3 & 4
